entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening except periods of snow over higher terrain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
